item.title: JAM Project featuring 福山芳樹 - The Gate of the Hell ("マジンカイザー 死闘!暗黒大将軍"OP)
item.description:
작곡: 河野陽吾 / 작사: 影山ヒロノブ
KY: 42966

(There was a time

end of this world

There was a gate

to dark side

And in there god

ended here

He will come here

as Kaizer

It’s just man’s gate

of gloom and hate

It’s not pretty

to look into)

Oh Oh

Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh

Oh Oh Oh Oh

Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh

Oh Oh

Oh Oh Oh Oh
